title: Allotments for the Remaining Tribes and Joshua
summary: Joshua 19 describes the land portions given to the remaining tribes: Simeon, Zebulun, Issachar, Asher, Naphtali, and Dan. Finally, Joshua himself receives an inheritance in Timnath Serah.

faq.question: Which tribes are given land in this chapter?
faq.answer: Simeon, Zebulun, Issachar, Asher, Naphtali, Dan, and Joshua.

faq.question: Where does Joshua settle?
faq.answer: In Timnath Serah, in the hill country of Ephraim.
